title: Effects of mixed enzymolysis alone or combined with acetylation or carboxymethylation on the role of jujube kernel fibre as a biosorbent for wastewater treatment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23037-23047
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04695A, Paper

This study investigates the effects of a mix of modifications on the wastewater-treatment ability of jujube kernel fibre.
